citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Numerous wild birds were observed in and around the enclosures housing ducks and turkeys, as well as in an area used
to store hay. There was also a mild accumulation of droppings from these birds on the ledges of the turkey enclosure.
Pests, such as wild birds, can transmit diseases and affect the health and well-being of animals. The facility must ensure
that a safe and effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests is established
and maintained so as to promote the health and well-being of the birds and reduce contamination by pests in animal
areas. Correct by December 17, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.158(d) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
Numerous wild birds were observed in and around the enclosures housing ducks and turkeys, as well as in an area used 
to store hay. There was also a mild accumulation of droppings from these birds on the ledges of the turkey enclosure. 
Pests, such as wild birds, can transmit diseases and affect the health and well-being of animals. The facility must ensure 
that a safe and effective program for the control of insects, ectoparasites, and avian and mammalian pests is established 
and maintained so as to promote the health and well-being of the birds and reduce contamination by pests in animal 
areas. Correct by December 17, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
